name: Sales Counter For WooCommerce
author: Themepoints

sections.description:
WooCommerce Sales Counter Plugin for WordPress, the ultimate tool to enhance your e-commerce experience. Designed to seamlessly integrate with your WooCommerce-powered website, this plugin adds a dynamic sales counter to your product pages, giving your customers real-time insight into product popularity.

Plugin Features

  • Display total sold item number for each product.
  • Display total sold item price for each product.
  • Sales count can be displayed in 3 positions on single product page.
  • Sales count can be displayed in 3 positions on product page.
  • Option to hide the sales count for product page.
  • Option to hide the sales count for product single page.
  • Disable Sales Counter for 0 order.
  • Define custom message for all 0 sold item products.
  • And Many More…
sections.installation:
1. Install as regular WordPress plugin.
  2. Go your Plugins setting via WordPress Dashboard and activate it.
  3. After activating the plugin, go to Dashboard-> Products and you see two Sales and Earnings.
